sanger.argml.graph.model
Class Mutation

java.lang.Object
  sanger.argml.graph.model.Mutation
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Mutation>
public class Mutation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Mutation>

Infinit sites mutation event. Only biallelic sequences are supported, so a nucleotide can have either the ancestral or the mutated value. Mutation events occure on the ancestral recombination graph and stored on edges.

Author:
Lior Galanti
